name: Dijon

hero_dishes.name: Boeuf Bourguignon at Le Bouchon du Palais
hero_dishes.description: Burgundy beef stew with red wine, carrots, onions, and mushrooms, slow-cooked until melt-in-your-mouth tender
hero_dishes.origin_story: Boeuf bourguignon is Burgundy's signature dish, born from the region's incredible wines and Charolais beef. Le Bouchon du Palais serves it the traditional way: cooked for hours until the beef dissolves on your tongue
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Le Bouchon du Palais (cozy bistro atmosphere), Chez LÃ©on, or William Frachot (2 Michelin stars, modern interpretation)
